article_title: CMS announces second round of Next Generation ACO applications
article_text:

article_metadata.description: The Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services announced a new application period for the Next Generation Accountable Care Organization program for the second round, which begins Jan. 1, 2017.

og.description: The Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services announced a new application period for the Next Generation Accountable Care Organization program for the second round, which begins Jan. 1, 2017.
og.title: CMS announces second round of Next Generation ACO applications
